pre_survey.description: Helpline Specific configs/lex/en_JM/intents Pre Survey Intent Survey intent

conclusion_statement.content: Thanks for that, the next message you get will be from one of our counsellors. In the meantime, if you are interested here's a link to our privacy statement: https://www.youthline.co.nz/psyp

rejection_statement.content: Sorry, I'm having trouble understanding. We'll transfer you now. Please hold for a practitioner.

value_elicitation_prompt.content:
Kia ora, Welcome to Youthline. Before we link you in with one of our counsellors, this is a quick automatic message - do you need urgent support? 
1. Yes 
2. No
